dct_title_s: Iudæa seu Terra Sancta quæ Hebræorum sive Israelitarum
dct_alternative_sm: Judaea seu Terra Sancta quae Hebraeorum sive Israelitarum
dct_description_sm: ex conatibus geographicis Gulielmi Sanson ; Hubertus Jaillot ; Cordier, sculp.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
5 bar scales on map given in "Stadia", "Mille passus", "Milliaria unius horae", "Leucae gallicae", and "Dietce".
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries of the twelve tribes of Israel, places of historical interest.
Features 2 decorative cartouches with illustrations of holy men and the garden of Eden.
